data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Mugla.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Mugla, Turkey
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Mugla, Turkey to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.
Spirit, sanctify the 325 believers in Mugla and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Mugla.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Mugla, Turkey to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Mugla, Turkey find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.section_summary:
the state of Mugla, Turkey has a population of 866,700.

We estimate Mugla has 325 people who might know Jesus, 4,852 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 861,523 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 2,666 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Mugla, Turkey.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.
